message.content: This question requires some basic math skills. If half of a herd of cows is incinerated, that means half of the cows will no longer exist. Therefore, there will be fewer cows overall. Option (B) is incorrect because incinerating half the herd would result in fewer cows, not slightly more. Option (C) is incorrect because incinerating half the herd would also result in fewer cows, not more. Option (D) is incorrect because incinerating half the herd would result in fewer cows, not many more.
